name: MobileUserAgent
short_description:
Mobile user agent string parsing class for PHP5 and Perl. Parses almost every mobile user agent string into it's basic constituent parts, the most important being vendor and model. Co-developers are very welcome.
Tested OK on 2000+ user agent strings.
